caption.p: Composition of the leaf extracts of borneol-type and linalool-type of C. camphora. a C. camphora leaves used in transcriptome sequencing. b Leaf extracts obtained by water-distillation from C. camphora (left borneol-type, right linalool-type). The scale bar =1 cm in A and B. c Terpene composition obtained by GC-MS from borneol and linalool chemotype leaves of C. camphora. FW: fresh weight. The terpenes content > 0.1 mg. g − 1 FW are shown for simplicity
